extendedInfo.description: Waterloo State Recreation Area guide by Exploration Guides.This app is everything you need to visit Waterloo State Recreation Area, located between Ann Arbor and Jackson, Michigan.  Whether you're hiking, biking, cross-country skiing, horseback riding, bird watching, or exploring, Exploration Guides' Waterloo State Recreation Area gives you everything you need to make the most of your visit.Includes:* Full, surveyed trail maps - almost over 50 miles!* Suggested trails* Favorite trail: pick a trail and it highlights on the map* GPS navigation - includes the ultimate "You are here!" * Electronic compass* Camera integration: take pictures and send to email, FaceBook, and more* Major points of interest, including Exploration Guides' custom web pages with all the information you'll need* View maps with either the standard Google Maps view, or areal photography/satellite view* Park your car, touch the screen, and your car appears on the map.  Never lose your car again! (yes, you can use this outside the park, too!)* Check current weather, or the 10-day forecast for the park* Get turn-by-turn directions to the park with Google NavigationWe're all explorers.  You just need the right guide!

reviews.title: 1.0.3 update
reviews.comment: The 1.0.3 update allows you to move to SD.
reviews.author: A Google User
